title: WTB: Cicotte & Wagner (bat on left) Piedmont 150
author: VintageJay

posts.post_title: WTB: Cicotte & Wagner (bat on left) Piedmont 150
posts.post_content:
I'm looking to buy T206 Ed Cicotte and Heinie Wagner (bat on left shoulder) Piedmont 150 cards.

I prefer raw. Any condition will do!

Thanks,
Jay

Here is one I have on eBay.
Let me know if interested. Maybe we can work out a deal - through here - and complete on eBay.

[url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/172148787012?ssPageName=STRK:MESELX:IT&_trksid=p3984.m1555.l2649[/url]

-Jimmy
